attributes.action: all students allowed to toilet during lesson time
attributes.additional_details: let them go to the toilet if they need to even if they don't have a toilet pass. It could be a distraction if students are busting and teachers are allowed to go but students aren't
attributes.background: let all students allowed to use the bathroom during lesson. boys or girls,no exceptions let them use toilet

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/731355
